thread.title: WaterStreet Company Attains VMware IaaS Powered Status in the VMware vCloud Air Network
thread.title_full: WaterStreet Company Attains VMware IaaS Powered Status in the VMware vCloud Air Network

author: PRWEB
title: WaterStreet Company Attains VMware IaaS Powered Status in the VMware vCloud Air Network
text:
Gregg Barrett, president, of WaterStreet Company stated, “It’s great to be a member of the vCloud Air Network to ensure the highest level of service to our customers.” Big Fork, Montana
This designation illustrates to customers that the company’s public cloud service is validated for use with VMware vSphere®, the leading virtualization platform for building cloud infrastructures.
A member of the VMware vCloud Air Network, WaterStreet Company provides its VMware IaaS Powered service, using proven VMware technology that organizations already use in their existing data centers. VMware vCloud Air Network Service Providers offer global cloud services in more than 100 countries.
“We chose VMware as our partner years ago and this was the natural progression of services,” said Gregg Barrett, president, WaterStreet Company. “It’s great to be a member of the vCloud Air Network to ensure the highest level of service to our customers.”
“VMware IaaS Powered services delivered by VMware vCloud Air Network Service Providers can provide the efficiency, agility, and reliability inherent in cloud computing,” said Jim Aluotto, Director, Service Provider Business Americas Region, VMware. “We look forward to supporting WaterStreet Company further as it empowers organizations with a simple and flexible path to the cloud.”
Customers of WaterStreet have the ability to move workloads from their VMware vSphere-based virtualized or private cloud environment to the VMware IaaS Powered service. This allows customers to achieve flexibility and security, while enabling increased IT agility.
WaterStreet Company sought VMware IaaS Powered validation in order to extend their current relationship with VMware. As a VMware vCloud Air Network Service Provider, WaterStreet Company can now provide users with enhanced responsiveness and agility, and enable reduced IT costs through greater performance, availability and scalability.
About WaterStreet Company
WaterStreet Company is based in Bigfork, Montana, and serves insurers and reinsurers nationwide. Its mission is to deliver value to small and midsize P&C insurers by supporting their operational and technology needs so they can work more efficiently, manage headcount and cost, and focus on their core objectives. For more information, visit http://www.waterstreetcompany.com
Note: VMware, VMware vCloud and VMware vSphere are registered trademarks or trademarks of VMware, Inc. in the United States and other jurisdictions. All other marks and names mentioned herein may be trademarks of their respective companies. The use of the word “ partner” or “partnership” does not imply a legal partnership relationship between VMware and any other company.
